snippet: Two lawyers who are engaged in the representation of detainees say the government’s treatment of the prisoners has violated the rule of law.
lead_paragraph: Two lawyers who are engaged in the representation of detainees say the government’s treatment of the prisoners has violated the rule of law.

headline.main: Prisoners at Guantánamo: A Tally of 149 Cases
headline.print_headline: Prisoners at Guantánamo: A Tally of 149 Cases
